attributes.action: Ensure that the Saga Group live up to their responsibilities in running the Sagazone chat web site
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
"We the undersigned, who are or were members of the Sagazone forum.

Many of whom are housebound, or who are heavily dependent on Saga zone as an important life line, both physically, socially and mentally, ask that the prime minister:

 

Ensure that the Saga Group live up to their responsibilities in running the Sagazone chat web site for the benefit of its members, in that.

 

Saga shall set up and maintain an open, fair and unbiased grievance procedure.
 

To allow and not curtail freedom of speech, that is within the confines of common law and decency.
 

To provide adequate, trained, unbiased and open moderation of the site at all times.
 

To treat its members, and client base with the respect due to people of our mature years. 
 

Just because we are over 50 does not mean we have lost our faculties, our intelligence, our basic human rights of free speech or that we should be treated with out regard to our feelings and position."
